july meeting news

25 July, 2016

This evening’s topics were predominately Sport and Movement. Involving, mainly, how to capture movement with and without blur. A number of images were shown providing details of indoor and outdoor techniques including artificial lighting to arrest the action. A brief discussion followed on how we may replicate the images shown.

A ‘YouTube’ video was then shown on landscape photography and the use of light in differing situations and at various times of year.

You can view that video HERE or watch below.

If you enjoyed the video by Thomas Heaton, you can see his channel HERE. I think you’ll find this a very useful site to get some tips and tricks for Landscape Photography.

Monthly Competition.


The ‘Monthly Competition’ entitled ‘People’ was held.

The winners were:-

  • 1st - 'Henley Girl' by John Horton
  • 2nd - 'Under the Blanket' by Tony Gravett
  • Joint 2nd - 'Blue Brigade' by John Horton
'Henley Girl' by John Horton

These images have been cropped to suit layout, Members receive full size versions with their monthly newsletter and viewing at Monthly Meeting.


Quarterly Competition.


The ‘Quarterly Competition’ entitled ‘Abstracts’ was held.

The winners were:-

  • 1st - 'Stars and Stripes' by Joan Banks
  • 2nd - 'Go with the Flow' by John Horton
  • 3rd - 'Tunnel Vision' by Joan Banks
'Henley Girl' by John Horton

These images have been cropped to suit layout, Members receive full size versions with their monthly newsletter and viewing at Monthly Meeting.
